text:
Uvari police are on the lookout for a youth, who robbed an old woman of gold ornaments on Saturday evening.

Police said an unidentified masked youth, who entered the house of Venancius of Koottappanai under Uvari police station limits, attacked his wife Bahendra (60) and escaped with her chain, weighing 21 sovereigns, and bangles weighing 7.50 sovereigns.

Though her son Vijayan, who came to the house at that time, tried to catch the robber, he escaped. Uvari police have registered a case.
title: 28 sovereigns robbed
